						About
			'b' 'b'About'b"SFU is Canada's most community-engaged research university, with three thriving urban campuses."b'In the place where 'b'innovative education'b', cutting-edge 'b'research'b' and 'b'community outreach'b" intersect, you'll find Simon Fraser University. Our "b'vision'b"? To be Canada's leading engaged university."b"Born in 1965, SFU has become Canada's leading comprehensive university with vibrant campuses in British Columbia's largest municipalities \xe2\x80\x94 "b'Vancouver'b', 'b'Burnaby'b' and 'b'Surrey'b' \xe2\x80\x94 and deep roots in partner communities throughout the province and 'b'around the world'b'.'b'Administration'b'Meeting services'b'Sustainability'b'Technology services'b'Give to SFU'b'Careers at SFU'b'Strategic Vision'b'Accreditation'b'A-Z directory'b'Social media channels'b'Faculties + departments'b'Campuses'b'Burnaby campus'b'8888 University Drive, Burnaby, BC\xc2\xa0'b'

Security: 778.782.5029'b'History'b'Statistics'b'See current \xe2\x80\x9c'b'fingertip statistics'b'\xe2\x80\x9d from Institutional Research and Planning.'b"Located in Canada on British Columbia's west coast and named for an "b'early explorer'b', Simon Fraser University opened on September 9, 1965 with 2,500 students.'b'Noted Canadian architects Arthur Erickson and Geoffrey Massey designed the original Burnaby Mountain campus to foster interdisciplinary contact between students and researchers. That same openness and desire to innovate informs SFU\xe2\x80\x99s current 'b'vision'b": to be Canada's most community-engaged research university."b'Now boasting three distinctive campuses, 30,000 students, 6,500 faculty and staff, and more than 160,000 alumni, SFU has matured into one of the world\xe2\x80\x99s leading teaching and research universities.'b'Consistently ranked among Canada\xe2\x80\x99s top comprehensive universities and named to the Times Higher Education list of 100 world universities under 50, SFU is also the first Canadian member of the National Collegiate Athletic Association, the world\xe2\x80\x99s largest college sports association.\xc2\xa0'b' 'b'Admission'b'Programs'b'Learning'b'Research'b'Community'b'About'b'Maps + directions'b'Library'b'Academic Calendar'b'Road Report'b'Give to SFU'b'Emergency Information'b'Connect with us'b' 'b'Instagram'b'Facebook'b'Twitter'b'YouTube'b'LinkedIn'b'Contact us'b' 'b'Burnaby campus'b'Surrey campus'b'Vancouver campus'b' 'b'We would like to acknowledge that at Simon Fraser University we live and work on the unceded traditional territories of the Coast Salish peoples of the Musqueam, Squamish, and Tsleil-Waututh\xc2\xa0Nations.'b'Terms and conditions'b'\xc2\xa9 Simon Fraser University'b' end page-content 'b' end page 'b' end container '
